rules.title: Solo mode
content: This mode allows you to play alone against the computer. Just be the first to line up 4 chips
of your color horizontally, vertically or diagonally. If the board fills up without a winner,

rules.title: Classic mode
content: The game as you know it, except better. The goal is to align horizontally, vertically or
diagonally as many chips as selected in the game creation options.
You can also change the dimensions of the board. This mode supports 2 to 5 players.

rules.title: Time attack
content: In this mode, the goal remains the same as the classic mode, with the only difference
that you must play within a set time. The board dimensions and the number of chips
in a row you need to win are customizable. This mode supports 2 to 5 players.

rules.title: Roulette mode
content: In this mode, your chips have a chance to get a special effect that will dramatically change
the way you play. The board dimensions and the number of chips in a row you need
to win are customizable. This mode supports 2 to 5 players.
